retention_statement: Retain 5 years after pilot retirement or 40 years after license issue, whichever is greater, then transfer to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_title: Application Files - Incomplete, Terminated or Rejected
series_description: Documents the receipt of incomplete, terminated or rejected applications for licensing of Branch Pilots by the Department. Branch pilots are licensed, under the provisions of
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after the end of the calendar year of submission, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, §§ 54.1-900 through 54.1-927, to pilot oceangoing vessels within the navigable waters of Virginia.
